item.title: Katie add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "Stuff your eyes with wonder, he said, live as if you'd drop dead in ten seconds. See the world. It's more fantastic than any dream made or paid for in factories." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: Katie add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "We are cups, constantly and quietly being filled. The trick is, knowing how to tip ourselves over and let the beautiful stuff out." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: Katie add a quote by Charles de Lint
item.description: "We're all made of stories. When they finally put us underground, the stories are what will go on. Not forever, perhaps, but for a time. It's a kind of immortality, I suppose, bounded by limits, it's true, but then so's everything." -- Charles de Lint

item.title: Katie add a quote by Charles de Lint
item.description: "Without mysteries, life would be very dull indeed. What would be left to strive for if everything were known?" -- Charles de Lint
